summary: This is a corrected marriage certificate from Clark County, Nevada, documenting the marriage between Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch and Giuseppe Cipolla on November 21, 2019, at the Tropicana LV Weddings chapel in Las Vegas. The officiant was Victoria Robinson, and the witness was Chrishaunda C. Morgan.

persons.name: Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch
persons.context: The bride in the marriage ceremony, who wished to use the name Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch-Cipolla after marriage.

persons.name: Giuseppe Cipolla
persons.context: The groom in the marriage ceremony.

persons.name: Victoria Robinson
persons.context: The officiant who performed the marriage ceremony.

persons.name: Chrishaunda C. Morgan
persons.context: The witness present at the marriage ceremony.

connections.description: Married on November 21, 2019, in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Victoria Robinson officiated the marriage ceremony for Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch.
Victoria Robinson officiated the marriage ceremony for Giuseppe Cipolla.
Chrishaunda C. Morgan witnessed the marriage of Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch.

events.title: Marriage of Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch and Giuseppe Cipolla
events.description: Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch and Giuseppe Cipolla were married in a ceremony officiated by Victoria Robinson and witnessed by Chrishaunda C. Morgan at Tropicana LV Weddings in Las Vegas, Nevada.

locations: Tropicana LV Weddings, 8 Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, Nevada
keyFacts: Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch and Giuseppe Cipolla were married on November 21, 2019, in Las Vegas, Nevada.
The bride intended to use the surname Averbuch-Cipolla after marriage.
The marriage certificate is a corrected version, as indicated by the notation 'CORRECTED'.
The document provides birth dates for both parties: Carmit Pesia Tacher Averbuch was born on January 3, 1969, and Giuseppe Cipolla was born on August 9, 1972.
